definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: Haiyantang Bridge is a new-type self-anchored suspension bridge in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江海盐塘桥工程为一新型的自锚式悬索桥结构。

sentences.english: The suspension bridge scheme is adopted for Chongqing Egongyan bridge.
sentences.chinese: 重庆鹅公岩长江大桥设计采用悬索桥方案。

sentences.english: So the root foundation can be a potential choice for the anchor block of suspension bridge.
sentences.chinese: 根式基础用于悬索桥锚碇将成为一种新的选择。

sentences.english: It has strong geometric nonlinearity as well as the suspension bridge.
sentences.chinese: 与正式悬索桥一样具有强烈的几何非线性。

sentences.english: It is very important to monitor the stress in tower of suspension bridge during construction.
sentences.chinese: 悬索桥施工过程中索塔应力的监控非常关键。

sentences.english: This paper emphasizes to describe the design essentials of the all welded main saddles for several suspension bridges.
sentences.chinese: 着重论述几座悬索桥的全焊接主缆鞍座设计要点。

sentences.english: Design of hanger tension and cable configuration for self-anchored suspension bridges;
sentences.chinese: 自锚式独塔悬索桥是悬索桥类形中较新的一种。

sentences.english: Design of hanger tension and cable configuration for self-anchored suspension bridges;
sentences.chinese: 自锚式独塔悬索桥是悬索桥类形中较新的一种。

sentences.english: Seismic response of a concrete self-anchored suspension bridge is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对一座自锚式混凝土悬索桥结构进行了地震反应分析。

sentences.english: But until this new technology can be safely implemented, the suspension bridge will still rule the waters.
sentences.chinese: 但直到新技术能够安全实施，悬索桥依然占主导地位。

sentences.english: The early chinese built suspension bridges of hemp rope .
sentences.chinese: 古代的中国人建造过麻绳悬索桥。

sentences.english: It was the first eyebar suspension bridge.
sentences.chinese: 它是第一座眼杆式悬索桥。

sentences.english: Steel box girder is widely used in modern long-span suspension bridge structure.
sentences.chinese: 钢箱梁结构在现代大跨度悬索桥体系中较多采用。

definition: Da Qiao, one of the Two Qiaos, according to Romance of the Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4], the two great beauties of ancient China
bay bridge (elevated bridge across stretch of water)
to join the two sections (of a linear structure: bridge, dike etc) to complete its construction
